story_arceus_03_09000/2401_1001_0100_10: Well played. Then my next card will be...
story_arceus_03_09000/2401_1001_0300_10: We can still do this. Kyurem!
story_arceus_03_09000/2401_1001_0400_10:
If somebody wins a battle, then, without doubt,
someone else has lost the battle!
story_arceus_03_09000/2401_1001_0700_10: Not a bad choice at all. It’s fascinating.
story_arceus_03_09000/2401_1001_0800_10: But I still have a path to victory!
story_arceus_03_09000/2401_1001_1100_10: Still had an ace up your sleeve, eh?
story_arceus_03_09000/2401_1001_1300_10:
There is one more opponent against whom you
must prove your strength... The Champion!
